alert.note: Alert for Ouachita (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 25 at 7:59AM CDT by NWS Shreveport
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of eastern Ouachita Parish through 830 AM CDT... At 759 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Richwood, or near Brownsville-Bawcom, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Monroe, Claiborne, West Monroe, Swartz, Brownsville-Bawcom, Brownsville-Bawcomville, Richwood, Sterlington, Drew, Fairbanks, Perryville, Millhaven, Pine Grove, Guthrie and Deshard. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
